extendedInfo.description: CorrigoNet by Corrigoâ¢ is a powerful tool for managing your buildings, equipment, and your customers who rely on those assets.Give your field employees access to work orders on their Android phones. The mobile app allows internal technicians and employees to connect with the âback-officeâ and works seamlessly with the desktop browser app.Built by Corrigo, operators of The Work Order Network: - Corrigo has helped define what truly effective field service management solutions should deliver- More than one hundred thousand users in locations all over the country - The Corrigo family of solutions is used by major restaurant, grocery, convenience and retail chains, property management firms, homebuilders, facility managers and contractorsCorrigoNet Mobile Feature Highlights:- Process Work Orders offline- View Work Order Details- View and Add Text Notes- Add and Edit Work Order Costs- View and Edit NTE- Find Work Orders- Create New Work Orders- Capture technician GPS data- Attach pictures to work orders- Assign and re-assign work orders- See and manage your team's work orders- Use the camera to scan materials bar codes- Signature captureThis mobile app is compatible with CorrigoNet and WorkTrack Facilities Management only.   A subscription is required.  It does not work with WorkTrack Service Management, Intuit Field Service Management, nor WorkTrack Construction and Crews.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I get an error went trying to log in
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Still slow
reviews.comment: What happen to the update that was going to take place in July. Will give it a 5 star if the update ever happens
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No alerts
reviews.comment: No alerts. If i didn\'t need this for my job i wouldn\'t ever consider it. Constantly having to check for work orders just plain sucks
reviews.author: Lavi Bosneac

reviews.title: Great Application
reviews.comment: I have used the application for several weeks now. I used to use the Blackberry version and am impressed with how easy the Android version is to use. A big step forward.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs audio alert
reviews.comment: I need an audio alert.  I cant keep opening the app the check for work orders I need it to tell me when I have a work order
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Only gives asynctask error when trying to log in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good app.  It is quick, easy to use.  Perfect for what we need it for.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Upgrade
reviews.comment: Have been using the app to manage my facilities work for over a year now and can\'t imagine using anything else at this point. My techs love the new features released on the Android. Great work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Solid application
reviews.comment: Used for 2 months. Solid performance and does everything we need of it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: You are deliberately misrepresenting
reviews.comment: Your product. This is one of your selling points that needs to be resolved.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Need notification alerts and better interface. Love the price! Thanks
reviews.author: Abel garcia

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: We have been using this app for several weeks. Works flawless.
reviews.author: A Google User
